name: Chicken Robot on Mars
description:
Robot Chicken on Mars is a small dungeon crawler made by myself and my friend 203

You play as a robot send to mars who fell in a cavern and since you have nothing better to do you started to explore the cavern you need to find the trap door in each floor but be careful of the fall !

You can pickup items that will help you in your adventure but be careful if the item look broken it could make your stats worse but it might help you a lot choose wisely when picking a broken item

For the controlls I higly recommend to play with a controller the left stick is for moving the right one is for shooting in the 4 cardinals directions (You can use the D-Pad for moving and the ABXY button to shoot)

On a keyboard use the WASD for moving and the arrow to shoot


Exemple of a normal item

Exemple of a broken item

I hope you’ll have fun playing that little game cause we had lot of fun making it !
